DataElement.preferredName: Notification Plan Study Activity Study Site Accrual Threshold Percent Unit ISO21090.INT.POS.v1.0
DataElement.preferredDefinition: An integer specifying a percentage of target accrual at a particular study site, which when reached triggers a notification. EXAMPLE(S): 75% or 90% of the target accrual number.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Notification Plan Study Activity Study Site Accrual Threshold Percent Unit
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Informing by words.:To devise, contrive, or formed in design.:A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:An action taken in pursuit of an objective._A facility in which study/protocol activities are conducted.:The process of obtaining subjects for a study.:The lowest limit at which something becomes detectable or relevant.:A unit for expressing a number as a fraction of hundred (on the basis of a rate or proportion per hundred).

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Informing by words.:To devise, contrive, or formed in design.:A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.:An action taken in pursuit of an objective.

Concepts.definition: To devise, contrive, or form in design.
A detailed examination, analysis, or critical inspection of a subject designed to discover facts about it.
An active process; excludes processes and mechanisms which fulfill biological functions.

Property.preferredName: Study Site Accrual Threshold Percent Unit
Property.preferredDefinition: A facility in which study/protocol activities are conducted.:The process of obtaining subjects for a study.:The lowest limit at which something becomes detectable or relevant.:A unit for expressing a number as a fraction of hundred (on the basis of a rate or proportion per hundred).

Concepts.definition: A facility in which study/protocol activities are conducted.
The process of obtaining subjects for a study.
The lowest limit at which something becomes detectable or relevant.
A unit for expressing a number as a fraction of hundred (on the basis of a rate or proportion per hundred).

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: DEC released per model owner approval. mc 2/2/11

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Constrains INT to a value of greater than 0.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Health Informatics - Harmonized data types for information interchange

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A number with no fractional part.

Concepts.definition: A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
